events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in several days, and I'm worried my package is lost.
The customer's issue was identified as a delivery delay due to the late arrival and lack of tracking updates.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay case and provide updates.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Let me check the status and help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the tracking details for you?
Sure, my order number is 4589321 and my shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield, IL. Thank you for checking on this.
I've contacted the delivery service to locate your package and expect a response within 24 hours. Meanwhile, we can offer a shipping refund if the package is confirmed lost.
Thank you for the quick response and the offer of a refund if needed. I appreciate you following up with the delivery service.
The delivery service confirmed your package was misplaced but has now been re-routed and will arrive in 2 days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm your order has arrived and if everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday and everything is in perfect condition. Thanks for your help resolving this so quickly.
We are glad your package arrived safely. Closing this case now, but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further help.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback is valuable to us.
